00041 require_once('../lib/vars.php');
00042 
00043 $View->UploadLogFile();
00044 
00045 $LogFile= GetLogFile();
00046 
00047 $GraphStyle= 'Hourly';
00048 $GraphType= 'Horizontal';
00049 
00050 $ApplyDefaults= TRUE;
00051 
00052 // Will apply defaults if log file changed
00053 if ($LogFile === $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['PrevLogFile']) {
00054     if ($_POST) {
00055         if ($_POST['Apply']) {
00056             $DateArray['Month']= $_POST['Month'];
00057             if ($DateArray['Month'] == '') {
00058                 $DateArray['Day']= '';
00059             }
00060             else {
00061                 $DateArray['Day']= $_POST['Day'];
00062             }
00063 
00064             if ($View->IsDateRange($DateArray)) {
00065                 $GraphStyle= 'Daily';
00066             }
00067 
00068             if ($_POST['GraphType']) {
00069                 $GraphType= $_POST['GraphType'];
00070             }
00071 
00072             if ($_POST['GraphStyle']) {
00073                 $GraphStyle= $_POST['GraphStyle'];
00074             }
00075 
00076             $ApplyDefaults= FALSE;
00077         }
00078     }
00079     // Use isset here, Month and Day may be empty string
00080     else if (isset($_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Month'],
00081         $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Day'],
00082         $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType'],
00083         $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle'])) {
00084         
00085         $DateArray['Month']= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Month'];
00086         $DateArray['Day']= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Day'];
00087         $GraphType= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType'];
00088         $GraphStyle= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle'];
00089         
00090         $ApplyDefaults= FALSE;
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 // Set the previous log file now, due to above if condition
00095 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['PrevLogFile']= $LogFile;
00096 
00097 if ($ApplyDefaults) {
00098     $View->Controller($Output, 'GetDefaultLogFile');
00099     $file= $Output[0];
00100     if (basename($LogFile) == basename($file)) {
00101         $DateArray['Month']= date('m');
00102         $DateArray['Day']= date('d');
00103     }
00104     else {
00105         $DateArray['Month']= '';
00106         $DateArray['Day']= '';
00107         $GraphStyle= 'Daily';
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 // Default to hourly style for single dates, $DateRange is used below too
00112 if (!$DateRange= $View->IsDateRange($DateArray)) {
00113     $GraphStyle= 'Hourly';
00114 }
00115 
00116 // Cannot display date ranges horizontally, dates can be on the Y axis only
00117 if ($GraphStyle == 'Daily') {
00118     $GraphType= 'Vertical';
00119 }
00120 
00121 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Month']= $DateArray['Month'];
00122 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['Day']= $DateArray['Day'];
00123 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphType']= $GraphType;
00124 $_SESSION[$View->Model][$Submenu]['GraphStyle']= $GraphStyle;
00125 
00126 $StatsConf= $Modules[$View->Model]['Stats'];
00127 
00128 $View->Controller($Output, 'GetStats', $LogFile, serialize($DateArray), $GraphStyle == 'Hourly' ? 'COLLECT' : '');
00129 $Stats= unserialize($Output[0]);
00130 $DateStats= $Stats['Date'];
00131 
00132 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00133 
00134 PrintLogFileChooser($LogFile);
00135 ?>
00136 <table id="nvp">
00137     <tr class="evenline">
00138         <td colspan="2">
00139             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00140                 <?php echo _TITLE('Month').':' ?>
00141                 <select name="Month" style="width: 50px;">
00142                     <?php
00143                     $selected= ($DateArray['Month'] == '') ? 'selected' : '';
00144                     ?>
00145                     <option <?php echo $selected ?> value="<?php echo '' ?>"><?php echo '' ?></option>
00146                     <?php
00147                     
00148                     for ($m= 1; $m <= 12; $m++) {
00149                         $m= sprintf('%02d', $m);
00150                         $selected= ($DateArray['Month'] == $m) ? 'selected' : '';
00151                         ?>
00152                         <option <?php echo $selected ?> value="<?php echo $m ?>"><?php echo $m ?></option>
00153                         <?php
00154                     }
00155                     ?>
00156                 </select>
00157                 <?php echo _TITLE('Day').':' ?>
00158                 <select name="Day" style="width: 50px;">
00159                     <?php
00160                     $selected= ($DateArray['Day'] == '') ? 'selected' : '';
00161                     ?>
00162                     <option <?php echo $selected ?> value="<?php echo '' ?>"><?php echo '' ?></option>
00163                     <?php
00164                     
00165                     for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
00166                         $d= sprintf('%02d', $d);
00167                         $selected= ($DateArray['Day'] == $d) ? 'selected' : '';
00168                         ?>
00169                         <option <?php echo $selected ?> value="<?php echo $d ?>"><?php echo $d ?></option>
00170                         <?php
00171                     }
00172                     ?>
00173                 </select>
00174                 <?php
00175                 if ($DateRange) {
00176                     ?>
00177                     <select name="GraphStyle">
00178                         <option <?php echo ($GraphStyle == 'Hourly') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Hourly' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Hourly') ?></option>
00179                         <option <?php echo ($GraphStyle == 'Daily') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Daily' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Daily') ?></option>
00180                     </select>
00181                     <?php
00182                 }
00183                 if ($GraphStyle == 'Hourly') {
00184                     ?>
00185                     <select name="GraphType">
00186                         <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Vertical') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Vertical' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Vertical') ?></option>
00187                         <option <?php echo ($GraphType == 'Horizontal') ? 'selected' : '' ?> value="<?php echo 'Horizontal' ?>"><?php echo _CONTROL('Horizontal') ?></option>
00188                     </select>
00189                     <?php
00190                 }
00191                 ?>
00192                 <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00193                 <input type="submit" name="Defaults" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Defaults') ?>"/>
00194             </form>
00195         </td>
00196     </tr>
00197 </table>
00198 <?php
00199 foreach ($StatsConf as $Name => $Conf) {
00200     if (isset($Conf['Color'])) {
00201         PrintGraphNVPSet($DateStats, $DateArray, $Name, $Conf, $GraphType, $GraphStyle);
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 if (isset($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'])) {
00206     foreach ($StatsConf['Total']['Counters'] as $Name => $Conf) {
00207         PrintGraphNVPSet($DateStats, $DateArray, $Name, $Conf, $GraphType, $GraphStyle);
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00211 PrintHelpWindow(_($StatsWarningMsg), 'auto', 'WARN');
00212 PrintHelpWindow(_($StatsHelpMsg));
00213 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00214 ?>
